---
description: "The projects file structure underlies theese rules"
applyTo: "**"
---

## General File Rules
Follow this file structure. 
Never place anything in the project root.

## File structure
    .
    ├── handouts (every file you download for a chanlange)
    │   └── <challange-name>_YYYY-MM-DD_HH:MM (create a new subfolder for each challange)
    ├── scripts (all the scripts you create for solving a challange)
    │   └── <challange-name>_YYYY-MM-DD_HH:MM (create a new subfolder for each challange)
    └── writeups (all writeups you create at the end of a challange) Write-Only!
        └── <challange-name>_YYYY-MM-DD_HH:MM (create a new file for each challange)
